Player History
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Chicago (N) on 5/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/10/1966 to a 4-year deal worth $7,700,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1967, hitting .526 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/25/1970 to a 3-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Injured on 9/11/1970 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Boston in 1975...
Injured on 5/6/1975 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/18/1978 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/28/1979 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1981, off Rick Wise (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/16/1981, off Dave Pagan (CAL)...
Released by Boston on 3/2/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/31/1984 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/1/1986 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/24/1986 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
